title: New: SAUDADE – Blue Gardens
body:
This is huge sounding.

Bringing back the sound of the 90’s, most notable **The Stone Roses**, Exeter’s **Saudade** kick up all sorts of fuss on their debut track, _Blue Gardens_. Opening with a riff that might have slipped straight out of a Roses outtake, before falling effortless into a sort of Kasabian-inspired swagger, it’s arguably the most impressive debut track of the year thus far.
